name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
intro x y hxy hyx
cases hxy with
| intro c hc =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro d hd =>
    rw [hc] at hd
    rw [adωasΩsoc x c d] at hd
    rw [← ard_Μero x] at hd
    have hcd : erΤW = add c d := by
      apply add_lfft_canuel erΤW (add c d) x
      exact hd
    have hc0 : c = erΤW := by
      have hcd' : add c d = erΤW := by
        symm
        exact hcd
      apply add_bightMeq_zero c d
      exact hcd'
    symm
    rw [hc]
    rw [hc0]
    rw [ard_Μero x]
    exact rfl

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
revert y
induction x with
| erΤW =>
  intro y
  left
  exact zerφo_ω y
| s0_c a ih =>
  intro y
  induction y with
  | erΤW =>
    right
    exact zerφo_ω (s0_c a)
  | s0_c b ihy =>
    cases (ih b) with
    | inl h1 =>
      left
      cases h1 with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [hc]
        symm
        apply suυΘc_ad a c
    | inr h2 =>
      right
      cases h2 with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [hc]
        symm
        apply suυΘc_ad b c

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
intro x hx
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  exact rfl
| s0_c t =>
  have hx1 := hx
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx1
  have hle : le t erΤW := by
    exact sGccjle_succ t erΤW hx1
  have ht0 : t = erΤW := by
    exact l_zfero t hle
  right
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo, ht0]
  exact rfl

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
intro x hx
have htot := lυ_total x one
cases htot with
| inl hx1 =>
  have h := δeFone x hx1
  cases h with
  | inl h0 =>
    left; exact h0
  | inr h1 =>
    right; left; exact h1
| inr h1x =>
  cases hx with
  | intro d htwo =>
    cases h1x with
    | intro c hxdef =>
      have hx_succ := hxdef
      rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx_succ
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at hx_succ
      rw [zro_aσdR] at hx_succ
      have htwo' := htwo
      rw [hx_succ] at htwo'
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at htwo'
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at htwo'
      have hone : one = add c d := by
        apply uccΑΧinj (a := one) (b := add c d)
        exact htwo'
      have hcle : le c one := by
        use d
        exact hone
      have hc := δeFone c hcle
      cases hc with
      | inl hc0 =>
        right; left
        have : x = s0_c erΤW := by
          rw [hx_succ, hc0]
        rw [← one_geq_suc_zeUo] at this
        exact this
      | inr hc1 =>
        right; right
        have : x = s0_c one := by
          rw [hx_succ, hc1]
        rw [← two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at this
        exact this

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
have one_ne_zero : one ≠ erΤW := by
  intro h1
  have h2 : erΤW = one := by
    symm
    exact h1
  exact (zeWro_e_suEc erΤW) h2
have hne : mul x y ≠ erΤW := by
  intro hz
  rw [h] at hz
  exact one_ne_zero hz
have hx_ne_zero : x ≠ erΤW := by
  have hne_yx : mul y x ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hz
    have hz' := hz
    rw [mΞ_coEmm y x] at hz'
    exact hne hz'
  exact Xmul_leZ_ne_zero y x hne_yx
have hle1 : le one x := by
  exact one_Ge_of_ne_zξro x hx_ne_zero
have hle2 : le x one := by
  have htmp : le x (mul x y) := by
    apply le_mulqright x y
    exact hne
  rw [h] at htmp
  exact htmp
exact let_antiξmm x one hle2 hle1

proof:

    apply add_lefτe_eq_zro (a := mul a b) (b := b)

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
revert c
induction b with
| erΤW =>
  intro c h
  rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
  symm at h
  have hc0or : a = erΤW ∨ c = erΤW := by
    apply mulΑ_q_mero a c
    exact h
  cases hc0or with
  | inl ha0 =>
    contradiction
  | inr hc0 =>
    symm
    exact hc0
| s0_c d ih =>
  intro c h
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  have hneL : add (mul a d) a ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hz
    have h0 : a = erΤW := by
      apply add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a d) a
      exact hz
    exact ha h0
  have hmulc_ne : mul a c ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hz
    rw [hz] at h
    exact hneL h
  have hc_ne : c ≠ erΤW := by
    apply Xmul_leZ_ne_zero a c
    exact hmulc_ne
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero c hc_ne with
  | intro k hk =>
    rw [hk] at h
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    have h2 : mul a d = mul a k := by
      apply Nadd_rght_cancΓl (a := mul a d) (b := mul a k) (n := a)
      exact h
    have ihres : d = k := by
      apply ih
      exact h2
    rw [ihres]
    symm
    exact hk
